sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_fd36b18ddb3e3300e294294648961942
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.VFXUpdateSetUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>VFXUpdateSetUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var VFXUpdateSetUtils = Class.create();
VFXUpdateSetUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	preview: function(rusSysID) {
		var rus = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
		rus.get(rusSysID);
		if(rus.state=='loaded') {
			var usPreview = new UpdateSetPreviewAjax();
			usPreview.previewRemoteUpdateSetAgain(rus);
		}
	},
	
	commit: function(rusSysID) {
		var rus = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
		rus.get(rusSysID);
		if(rus.state=='previewed' && rus.collisions==0) {
			var worker = new GlideUpdateSetWorker();
			var lus = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
			var lus_sysid = worker.remoteUpdateSetCommit(lus, rus, rus.update_source.url);
			var usCommit = new UpdateSetCommitAjax();
			usCommit._copyUpdateXML(lus_sysid, rus.sys_id);
			rus.update();
			worker.setUpdateSetSysId(lus_sysid);
			worker.setProgressName(gs.getMessage("Committing update set: {0}", rus.name));
			worker.setBackground(false);
			worker.start();
			gs.print(lus_sysid);
		}
	},

    type: 'VFXUpdateSetUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-20 18:55:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>fd36b18ddb3e3300e294294648961942</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VFXUpdateSetUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fd36b18ddb3e3300e294294648961942</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-07-21 16:26:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
